author: dlr
msg: Repositioned the return of the AST in parse() more logically and
downcased the variable name as it is not a constant.

author: jon
msg: When an exception occurs in Runtime.parse it is not catched
and the parser is not returned to the pool in a finally
block. Therefore after N errors it runs out of parsers.
The Template.process which calls it has a try/finally block
just to close the input stream.
The trivial fix is below. Maybe it should add something to

author: geirm
msg: Added new VM-local context behavior with the switch :
in this jar, the default is ***TRUE***    This is for testing and discussion only for now...
